about_the_game:
"A.I.M. War Protocol" continues the story that began in "A.I.M. 2 Clan Wars". However, you do not have to play the previous parts. A completely new story awaits you.

For many years, the Mechminds lived in their artificial world – the Polygon, but then, for certain reasons, they split into two factions. One of them, the Sinigr clan, went beyond the Polygon and attracted a very powerful ally Nautilus to its side. Together with them, these Mechminds attacked the Polygon. The remaining Mechminds had to flee. Taking refuge in their Citadel in the wild and previously unexplored regions of the planet, the Mechminds managed to evacuate the Creators from the neighboring planet. Those are humans, whose space ark crashed many decades ago. And now, the Mechminds, along with the humans, are preparing to repel the threat.

You are a Mechmind, artificial intelligence that moves around the world on a glider – a combat vehicle with an anti-gravity engine. You have to communicate with people as a Mechmind and live among other Mechminds, that have their own view on the events that shook the world. Adventures full of dangers, mysteries and challenges await you. Communicate, fight, trade, explore, and take over whatever you find useful.

- Complete freedom of movement and action on a gigantic map.

- Extraordinary sci-fi storyline with multiple endings.

- Dozens of types of equipment: from light gliders to heavy "spiders" – striders.

- Powerful equipment upgrade system that allows you to improve many elements of your combat vehicle.

- Full change of time of day and weather conditions affecting the game.

- A full-fledged sequel of the "A.I.M. 2 Clan Wars" storyline.
detailed_description:
"A.I.M. War Protocol" continues the story that began in "A.I.M. 2 Clan Wars". However, you do not have to play the previous parts. A completely new story awaits you.

For many years, the Mechminds lived in their artificial world – the Polygon, but then, for certain reasons, they split into two factions. One of them, the Sinigr clan, went beyond the Polygon and attracted a very powerful ally Nautilus to its side. Together with them, these Mechminds attacked the Polygon. The remaining Mechminds had to flee. Taking refuge in their Citadel in the wild and previously unexplored regions of the planet, the Mechminds managed to evacuate the Creators from the neighboring planet. Those are humans, whose space ark crashed many decades ago. And now, the Mechminds, along with the humans, are preparing to repel the threat.

name: A.I.M.3: War Protocol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: A role-playing game with survival and action-simulation elements. You are going to explore a huge world of an alien planet full of mysteries and secrets. Fight, trade, loot, evolve and collect knowledge about the world. Become the best. Survive where others die.
